title: Bancorpsouth Bank (BXS) Expected to Announce Earnings of $0.55 Per Share
content: Wall Street analysts expect that Bancorpsouth Bank (NYSE:BXS) will announce earnings of $0.55 per share for the current fiscal quarter, according to Zacks. Five analysts have provided estimates for Bancorpsouth Bank’s earnings. The lowest EPS estimate is $0.54 and the highest is $0.57. Bancorpsouth Bank posted earnings per share of $0.42 during the same quarter […]
